name: Pixel by Pixel
description:
Pixel by Pixel is an award winning digital marketing, branding, design, development and eCommerce agency based in Worthing, with offices also in Portugal and India.
We work with a broad range of clients, from enterprise level, to the world’s biggest soft drinks brand, to SMEs and all the way through to start-ups. We like it this way, as it keeps us fresh and energised, we get a huge kick from helping brands achieve their potential regardless of size or scale, that’s why we come to work in the morning.
